overview: Joel has over 15 years in telephony. His diverse senior positions have ranged from achieving fast growth nationwide for a start-up MVNO, CellcomTech Inc., to winning the US Government’s contract for immediate development and deployment of mobile devices for the Hurricane Katrina rescue mission. Previously, Joel was the CEO at BSD Telecom, a niche creator of leading edge mobile products that has been at the forefront of developing innovative voice-centric mobile applications that are in use today by millions of consumers.
